commit message: Library book collecting has been moved to the LibraryTabActivity
Library has no static instance since this moment
LibraryTabActivity opens book using intent instead of firect call of FBReader methods
opening of help text has been fixed
LibraryTabActivity has no references to FBReader.Instance()
code cleanup: unused methods have been removed
code cleanup: unused code has been removed
refactoring: method wait has been moved from ZLAndroidDialogManager to AndroidUtil
refatoring: unused code has been removed
cleanup: unused code has been removed

add '.settings' to .gitignore

Eclipse '.settings' settings folder has been added to .gitignore list

BookDownloaderService notifications fix

Duplicated call to downloadFinishHandler has been removed

LitResAuthenticationManager synchronization fix

Perform long actions outside of synchronized blocks

Fonts changes

Monospaced font has been added.
Font family names have been changed.
(cherry picked from commit 93a1a3c63cf239c80d98ddeb8bed936943e9a259)

Options dialog fix

Undefined styles list elements have been removed
(cherry picked from commit 36ac2168a5b2eec90b47ea8a4b171ca1403ecf65)
WakeLock refactoring: see ChangeLog for details
ZLFooter doesnot depend on files from fbreader package; footer height option is numeric (8..20) instead of string (small/medium/large)
unused changes in ZLStringListPreference have been rolled back
StringListPreferences supports ZLIntegerRangeOption only (instanceof has been avoided)
scrollbar type has been moved back to ZLTextView
method has been renamed: showScrollbar -> isScrollbarShown
setProgress method has been removed from ZLView
refactoring: a local variable fbReader has been extracted
footer options have been moved from ZLAndroidApplication to FBReader; ZLFooter depends on FBReader again
new preference item class has been added
new util class has been added
ZLAndroidColorUtil is used for more color conversion consistency
cleanup: unused import has been removed

code cleanup: page number computation doesn't depend on scrollbar code
default scrollbar type has been changed
method setProgress has been replaced by an existing gotoPage mechanism

code cleanup
a constant for FOOTER scrollbar type has been added
footer refactoring: ZLView.FooterArea interface has been created for view area that should be not moved during scrolling
SCROLLBAR_AS_FOOTER option has been moved to FBView
rollback: ZLTextView doesn't know about footer

java.net.URL has been replaced with ZLNetworkError

Direct usage of java.net.URL has been removed from OPDSLinkReader class

String constants have been added

New string constants for NetworkExceptions have been added

try-catch code cleanup

Neighbours try-catch blocks have been combined together.
fixed a Uri.EMPTY NPE (on old devices)

Intent filters fix

Intent filters have been changed not to open any file
(cherry picked from commit ecc11778f880ec9015eba3932080cea4141c7d8e)
a rare NPE has been fixed
battary info receiver has been moved from FBReader to ZLAndroidActivity
battery level processing has been updated: ZLApplication is an abstract class and shouldn't store battery level (for other platforms battery level might be not stored)
battery level (from the branch footer) has been added
'prevent screen from sleep' option has been extended: user can select a battery level to switch off this option
ZLFooter code simplification: we store info string instead of multiple info values
refactoring: platform-dependent classes have been moved to the android package; FBReader -> FBReaderActivity
refactoring: unused methods have been removed
cleanup: unused code has been removed
refactoring: a separate method in ZLAndroidWidget for footer drawing
bitmap to canvas painting has been moved from ZLFooter to ZLAndroidWidget
refactoring: more code moved from ZLFooter to ZLAndroidWidget
cleanup: unused code has been removed
refactoring: ZLPaintContext static instance has gone
refactoring: footer should be painted using ZLPaintContext instead of direct android calls
refactoring: footer painting does not use android calls
footer painting has been moved to FBView
cleanup: unused code has been removed
refactoring: more convenient string operations, line width

temporary rollback: no tap & sweep scrolling in the same time
new option: is footer sensitive or not
cleanup: a field is used insted of static access
url rewriting for external references has been fixed
footer long tap option is temporary commented
